1814.name: Serene Rejuvenation
1814.description: Increase healing to allies. Natural Harmony also applies alacrity in an area.

facts.description: Skills recharge faster.

skills.name: Natural Harmony
skills.description: Legendary Centaur. Collect energy, pulling it into the tablet to build up its power. After a short delay the energy will be released, healing nearby allies.

1815.name: Selfless Amplification
1815.description: Increase outgoing healing, based on a percentage of healing power.

facts.text: Outgoing Healing Increase per 100 Healing Power

1816.name: Disarming Riposte
1816.description: Striking a foe while they are using a skill blinds them.

facts.description: Next outgoing attack misses; stacks duration.

1817.name: Eluding Nullification
1817.description: Dodge rolling removes a condition from nearby allies.

1818.name: Invoking Harmony
1818.description: Healing done to allies is increased for a short duration after invoking a legend.

facts.description: Healing done to allies is increased for a short duration after invoking a legend.

1819.name: Tranquil Benediction
1819.description: The healing orbs that you create while wielding a staff will now grant swiftness and regeneration when picked up by allies.

facts.description: Gain health every second; stacks duration.
Movement speed increased by 33%; stacks duration.

1820.name: Momentary Pacification
1820.description: Using an elite skill attaches vines to nearby foes. After a short duration, vines will immobilize their host.

facts.description: Unable to move; stacks duration.

1821.name: Hardened Foundation
1821.description: Gain toughness. Gain healing power based on a portion of your toughness.

1822.name: Tranquil Balance
1822.description: While above the health threshold, healing to allies is increased.

1823.name: Nourishing Roots
1823.description: Grant regeneration to allies near Ventari's tablet.

facts.description: Gain health every second; stacks duration.

1824.name: Blinding Truths
1824.description: Blind nearby foes when you use a healing skill.

facts.description: Next outgoing attack misses; stacks duration.

1825.name: Natural Abundance
1825.description: Create energy fragments around Ventari's tablet when using a <c=@abilitytype>Legendary Centaur</c> skill.

1719.name: Roiling Mists
1719.description: Critical-hit chance has increased effectiveness when you are under the effect of fury.

1732.name: Cleansing Channel
1732.description: Invoking a legend removes a condition.

1749.name: Song of the Mists
1749.description: Invoking a legend casts a skill based on the legend you invoked.

skills.name: Call of the Assassin

facts.description: Skills and actions are faster.
Damage and condition damage taken are increased; stacks intensity.

skills.description: Strike enemies around you, inflicting vulnerability and gaining quickness for each foe you hit.

facts.description: Kalla's legend inspires you, increasing your critical strike and condition damage; stacks intensity.

1758.name: Ferocious Aggression
1758.description: Deal increased damage and condition damage to targets while you have fury.

1760.name: Rapid Flow
1760.description: Heal yourself and gain swiftness when you use a skill that has an energy cost.

facts.description: Movement speed increased by 33%; stacks duration.

Deal increased damage while you have an active upkeep skill.
Herald upkeep skills grant less damage but can be stacked.

1769.name: Empty Vessel
1769.description: Invoking a legend will now break stuns.

1774.description: Invoking a legend grants boons to nearby allies based on the legend that was invoked.

1778.description: Gain fury when you invoke a legend.

1784.description: Using a healing skill grants you fury.

1791.description: Invoking a legend while at or below the energy threshold grants extra energy to your new legend.

1721.description: Invoking a legend transfers conditions from you onto foes.

facts.description: Deals damage every second. Deals additional damage to moving foes. Stacks intensity.

1727.description: Increased damage for every condition currently on you.

1741.description: When you inflict torment you also inflict poison. Poison lasts longer.

1744.description: Torment you inflict deals more damage and lasts longer.

1789.description: Gain resistance when you use a <c=@abilitytype>Legendary Demon</c> skill.

facts.description: Deals damage every second. Deals additional damage to moving foes. Stacks intensity.

1801.name: Opportune Extraction
1801.description:
Steal a boon when you inflict torment on a foe affected by at least the threshold stacks of torment.
Each foe can only be affected once per interval.

1715.name: Swift Termination
1715.description: Deal increased damage to foes below the health threshold.

1724.name: Targeted Destruction
1724.description: Deal increased damage to targets with vulnerability.

1754.name: Assassin's Annihilation
1754.description: Siphon life from foes when hitting a foe from behind or the side.

1755.name: Jade Echo
1755.description: Use Lesser Jade Winds when you are downed. Deal increased damage while downed.

skills.name: Lesser Jade Winds
skills.description: Legendary Assassin Call upon the Jade Wind to turn nearby enemies into jade, stunning them for a short duration.

1765.name: Nefarious Momentum
1765.description: Gain might when using a legendary stance skill; gain more when using a <c=@abilitytype>Legendary Assassin</c> skill.

facts.description: Increased outgoing damage; stacks intensity.
Increased outgoing damage; stacks intensity.

1767.name: Vicious Lacerations
1767.description: When you attack while wielding a sword, gain a stack of vicious laceration. This can be stacked up to five times.

facts.description: Increased damage per stack.

1776.name: Ferocious Strikes
1776.description: Gain increased ferocity while dual-wielding weapons.

1786.name: Malicious Reprisal
1786.description: When you block or one of your attacks is blocked, your next attacks will be unblockable and deal increased damage.

facts.description: Your attacks can't be blocked.

1792.name: Focused Siphoning
1792.description: When you strike foes that have vulnerability, siphon life from them.

1800.name: Brutality
1800.description:
Gain quickness when you swap weapons. While you have quickness, your strikes remove stability.
This removal effect can only occur once per interval on each target.

facts.description: Skills and actions are faster.
Cannot be knocked down, pushed back, pulled, launched, stunned, dazed, floated, sunk, feared, or taunted.

1802.name: Assassin's Presence
1802.description: Increase the ferocity of nearby allies.

facts.description: Increases ferocity of nearby allies.

1808.name: Expose Defenses
1808.description: Your first attack when entering combat applies vulnerability. This ability is refreshed when you use an elite skill.

facts.description: Damage and condition damage taken are increased; stacks intensity.

1713.name: Determined Resolution
1713.description: Take reduced damage while you have stability. Stability you apply lasts longer.

1728.name: Close Quarters
1728.description: Reduce damage dealt to you from foes beyond the range threshold.

1740.name: Dwarven Battle Training
1740.description: Chance on hit to apply weakness to your foe. Incoming weakness applied to you has decreased effectiveness.

facts.description: Endurance regeneration decreased by 50%. 50% of hits are Glancing Blows (50% damage). Stacks duration.

1757.name: Unwavering Avoidance
1757.description: Gain stability when successfully evading an attack.

facts.description: Cannot be knocked down, pushed back, pulled, launched, stunned, dazed, floated, sunk, feared, or taunted.

1766.name: Eye for an Eye
1766.description:
Gain protection and taunt your foe when you are disabled.
Disables include: stun, daze, knockback, pull, knockdown, sink, float, fear, launch, and taunt.

facts.description: Involuntarily attack foes.
Incoming damage decreased by 33%; stacks duration.

1770.name: Versed in Stone
1770.description: Rite of the Great Dwarf affects condition damage as well. When struck below the health threshold, cast the Rite of the Great Dwarf. Gain power based on your toughness.

skills.name: Rite of the Great Dwarf

facts.description: Gain 50% damage and condition damage reduction. You are still susceptible control effects.

skills.description: Legendary Dwarf. Channel the power of the Rite of the Great Dwarf to turn yourself and nearby allies to stone to reduce incoming damage.

facts.description: Increased outgoing damage; stacks intensity.

facts.description: Reflect incoming damage back to its source; stacks duration.

1811.name: Planar Protection

1730.name: Harmonize Continuity
1730.description: When you successfully stun break, you also stun break nearby allies.

1737.name: Vigorous Persistence
1737.description: Gain increased endurance regeneration while you have an active upkeep skill.

1738.name: Bolster Fortifications
1738.description: Grant protection to nearby allies when using a healing skill. Deal increased damage while you have protection.

1743.name: Shared Empowerment
1743.description: When you apply a boon to an ally, also apply might to nearby allies.

facts.description: Increased outgoing damage; stacks intensity.

1746.name: Elder's Force
1746.description: Increased damage per boon on you.

1772.name: Soothing Bastion
1772.description: Activate Crystal Hibernation when struck while below the health threshold. Shield skills increase the duration of boons on nearby allies.

skills.name: Crystal Hibernation
skills.description: Channel a shield from the Mists to protect you, blocking attacks and regenerating health.

1777.name: Crystal Harbinger
1777.description: You can now use <c=@abilitytype>Legendary Dragon</c> skills and gain access to Facet of Nature.

skills.name: Facet of Nature

facts.description: Pulse Naturalistic Resonance to nearby allies every few seconds.
Improve your concentration.

skills.description: Legendary Dragon. Place the Facet of Nature on yourself to grant nearby allies Naturalistic Resonance every few seconds to increase outgoing boon duration.

facts.description: Critical Chance increased by 20%; stacks duration.

skills.description: Legendary Dragon. Consume Facet of Nature to unify with the other facets, gaining the boons they apply. Facet of Nature will be disabled while this skill is recharging.

facts.description: Cannot be knocked down, pushed back, pulled, launched, stunned, dazed, floated, sunk, feared, or taunted.

100% boost to magic find, WvW rank gain, experience from kills, and gold from kills.
